{"id":283171540,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1575278483,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"256 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/283171540/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"13.8 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def findUnsortedSubarray(self, nums) -> int:\n        \"\"\"O(n) time | O(1) space\"\"\"\n        i, j = 0, -1\n        INF = float('inf')\n        max_ = -INF\n        min_ = INF\n\n        left, right = 0, len(nums)-1\n        while right >= 0:\n            max_ = max(max_, nums[left])\n            if max_ != nums[left]: j = left\n\n            min_ = min(min_, nums[right])\n            if min_ != nums[right]: i = right\n\n            left += 1\n            right -= 1\n        return j - i + 1","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
